name: opencode-wakatime
description: Track OpenCode usage with WakaTime - monitor coding time, track productivity metrics, and analyze your development patterns.

installation.summary: Install via npm and configure with your WakaTime API key to start tracking.
installation.markdown:
## Installation

```bash
npm install opencode-wakatime
```

Add to your OpenCode config:

```json
{
  "plugins": ["opencode-wakatime"]
}
```

Configure your WakaTime API key in the settings.

Restart OpenCode to begin tracking.

usage.markdown:
## Usage

Once installed and configured:

### Features

- **Automatic Tracking**: All OpenCode sessions tracked automatically
- **Detailed Metrics**: Time spent per project, language, and file
- **Dashboard**: View analytics at [wakatime.com](https://wakatime.com)
- **Leaderboards**: Compare with other developers (optional)
- **Goals**: Set and track coding time goals

### What Gets Tracked

- Time spent in OpenCode
- Projects worked on
- Languages used
- Files edited
- Daily coding patterns

### Privacy

- No code content is sent
- Only metadata tracked
- Private by default
- Full control over shared data

### View Your Stats

Visit your WakaTime dashboard to see:
- Daily/weekly/monthly summaries
- Language breakdowns
- Project time distribution
- Productivity insights
